classDiagram
  class Shape {
    <<abstract>>
    +draw() void
  }
  class Circle {
    +radius int
    +draw() void
  }
  Shape <|-- Circle
---
+--------------+     
| <<abstract>> |     
|    Shape     |     
+--------------+     
|              |     
+--------------+     
| +draw()      |     
+--------------+     
        ^            
        |            
        |            
+--------------+     
|    Circle    |     
+--------------+     
| +int: radius |     
+--------------+     
| +draw()      |     
+--------------+
